gameObjects

Class NetworkedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameObjects.GameObject
      • gameObjects.VisibleGameObject
        • gameObjects.NetworkedObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NI_Base, NO_Bullet, NS_Base

    public class NetworkedObject
extends VisibleGameObject
    A class for easily networking game objects
    Author:
    aschmid
